Package edu.ncsu.csc.Galant.gui.editor

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GAlgorithmEditorPanel
    Each instance of GAlgorithmEditorPanel corresponds to a particular edit session of a particular algorithm file, or unsaved algorithm.
    GAlgorithmSyntaxHighlighting
    Adds syntax highlighting in the algorithm editor.
    GCompiledAlgorithmEditorPanel
    See GAlgorithmEdiorPanel.java
    GEditorFrame
    Frame for text editing in the editor window.
    GEditorMenuBar
    Menu bar for the text editor
    GEditorPanel
    Abstract class for the editor window's text panes.
    GGraphEditorPanel
    Each instance of GGraphEditorPanel corresponds to a particular edit session of a particular graph file, or unsaved graph.
    GGraphSyntaxHighlighting
    GraphML syntax highlighting for the textual graph editor
    GTabbedPane
    This class handles everything related to the tabs at the top of the text window.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GTabbedPane.AlgorithmOrGraph
